attributes.action: Bring back benefit books for those who can't manage bank accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people still do not or do not wish to have a bank account. Banks are a law unto their own, closing basic accounts at a whim, refusing to set up direct debits or standing orders for bills and rent. Some are severing their links with post offices
Bring back the order books for those who want them.
